name: Ashoka gGmbH
goal:
Ashoka is a leading global network of social entrepreneurs (3500+ Ashoka Fellows) who conceive and implement system-changing solutions to solve societal issues. Our vision is to contribute to a world of ‘Everyone a Changemaker’, using our social enterprises as role models and fostering the development of changemaking skills and mindsets in all sectors.
Ashoka Europe is active in 18 countries with 120 employees, supporting more than 550 social enterprises with numerous partners and supporters.
In addition to identifying, selecting and supporting social entrepreneurs, Ashoka Europe is also active in developing the appropriate ecosystems for social entrepreneurship through our local offices and numerous programs and resources (Social Innovation mapping, Visionary Program, Social Investment Toolkit, Co-creation toolkit, Impact Transfer, European Migration Accelerator, Changemaker Schools, and many more).
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, European Neighbourhood Policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
social enterprises, GECES, migration, employment, environment, ...
H2020, DG Grow, DG Empl
